title: Ticket to Ride
summary: The best-selling train board game with a new multiplayer cross-platform mode
description: The official adaptation of Days of Wonder's best-selling train board game, Ticket to Ride, now on mobile version!In addition to the exciting multiplayer mode, players will enjoy a new intuitive user interface, new social media capabilities to share exciting moments, and play against live opponents from all around the world on the various boards!With over 50 million games played online and a new game starting every 4 seconds on average, Ticket to Ride offers a game experience unique amongst its peers.**Ars Technica – « Ticket to Ride is impressive right from the start. »**Pocket Gamer: 9/10 with Gold Award – ""A fantastic adaptation of an excellent board game, and a must-buy for strategy fans""Ticket to Ride includes: • Alan R. Moon's official Ticket to Ride USA map with original artwork in full high resolution• 7 additional maps and 2 mini-expansions (containing 3 variants each) available in the shop in-game, with their own specificities: · Switzerland (map)  · USA 1910 (game variants) · Europe (map) · Legendary Asia (map) · India (vertical map) · Nordic Countries (vertical map) · Europa 1912 (game variants) · Pennsylvania (map)  · Germany (map)  · …Extra content is added regularly!• Solo play against up to 4 AI players.• Multiplayer support · Online Play (WiFi, 3G, 4G) against other tablets and smartphones (including Android and others) and computer gamers.  · An unparalleled online player community with tens of thousands of live opponents. · Pass-and-Play with up to 4 live opponents (can include AI players too). · True cross-platform: players can challenge on other platforms. • Detailed, interactive, turn-by-turn, in-game tutorial.• Contextual in-game notes to help you master all the maps.• Online and offline Hall of Fame.For more information, please visithttp://www.daysofwonder.com/online/en/t2r/Find all the latest news for Ticket to Ride Digital on Facebook and Twitter!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/asmodeedigital/Twitter: https://twitter.com/asmodeedigitalInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/asmodeedigital/You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/asmodeedigitalAlso, according to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play online games with Ticket to Ride or use the chat in the Online lobby.Languages available: English, French, German
descriptionHTML:
The official adaptation of Days of Wonder's best-selling train board game, Ticket to Ride, now on mobile version!
In addition to the exciting multiplayer mode, players will enjoy a new intuitive user interface, new social media capabilities to share exciting moments, and play against live opponents from all around the world on the various boards!
With over 50 million games played online and a new game starting every 4 seconds on average, Ticket to Ride offers a game experience unique amongst its peers.

**Ars Technica – « Ticket to Ride is impressive right from the start. »

**Pocket Gamer: 9/10 with Gold Award – ""A fantastic adaptation of an excellent board game, and a must-buy for strategy fans""

Ticket to Ride includes:

• Alan R. Moon's official Ticket to Ride USA map with original artwork in full high resolution
• 7 additional maps and 2 mini-expansions (containing 3 variants each) available in the shop in-game, with their own specificities:
· Switzerland (map)
· USA 1910 (game variants)
· Europe (map)
· Legendary Asia (map)
· India (vertical map)
· Nordic Countries (vertical map)
· Europa 1912 (game variants)
· Pennsylvania (map)
· Germany (map)
· …Extra content is added regularly!
• Solo play against up to 4 AI players.
• Multiplayer support
· Online Play (WiFi, 3G, 4G) against other tablets and smartphones (including Android and others) and computer gamers.
· An unparalleled online player community with tens of thousands of live opponents.
· Pass-and-Play with up to 4 live opponents (can include AI players too).
· True cross-platform: players can challenge on other platforms.
• Detailed, interactive, turn-by-turn, in-game tutorial.
• Contextual in-game notes to help you master all the maps.
• Online and offline Hall of Fame.

For more information, please visit
http://www.daysofwonder.com/online/en/t2r/

Find all the latest news for Ticket to Ride Digital on Facebook and Twitter!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/asmodeedigital/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/asmodeedigital
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/asmodeedigital/
You Tube: https://www.youtube.com/asmodeedigital


Also, according to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play online games with Ticket to Ride or use the chat in the Online lobby.

Languages available: English, French, German
comments: Should be 5 stars I love this game, both the board game and the app.  I haven't opened it in a while and was so excited to see local multiplayer.  Sadly, I was immediately disappointed when local multiplayer didn't work.  The devices won't connect and the app crashes.  If they can fix that, I'll give it 5 stars.  UPDATE: App no longer crashes after update.  Now, I just keep getting the "Not Connected" message.  I can see the open game server either direction, but can't get the game to connect.

It's great,really. It captures beautifully all the mechanics of the real board game, minus the hassle of setting up the game. There's a problem though: In the Pass & Play mode, the objectives (tickets) of each player are supposed to be secret, yet the game highlights them and even displays the ticket cards face up. I hope the devs will address this in a future update, seriously how such important detail slipped the testing?

Great game, very similar to the table top game but needs a play again button right after you finish a game. Seems clunky to have to go onto another screen to access game play again. Also, longest road could just flash instead of counting out the pieces but these are small niggles for such a great game.

Love the game, app sucks For a long while now, the app wont start on my galaxy tab3. Tries verifying update, gets to 90%, then switches to homescreen of game before spontaneously closing.. at least 3 updates since and still no fix
Freezes all the time then lets a bot take over and forces you to lose. Also notice that my score or karma change for the worse even if I haven't played. Love the game but it needs to work.

It's a fun game to kill time. I had never played the board game prior to buying this game, but it was easy to learn. I wish there was a portrait mode option though as it would make it so much more comfortable to play.
recentChanges: Several crashes fixed, specially on Local games
